tool_description:
Be the first to know about concerts
Track your favourite artists and never miss them live.
name: Songkick
title: Songkick

api_list.name: Artist search
api_list.description: Search for artists by name using full text search. Sorted by relevancy.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-songkick.p.rapidapi.com/search/artists"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-songkick.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://community-songkick.p.rapidapi.com/search/artists"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-songkick.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Artist’s upcoming events (calendar)
api_list.description: Find upcoming events for an artist. Use our artist search to find an artist ID.

api_list.name: Venue search
api_list.description: Search for venues on Songkick using full text search, including past names and aliases. Sorted by relevancy.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-songkick.p.rapidapi.com/search/venues.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-songkick.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://community-songkick.p.rapidapi.com/search/venues.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-songkick.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Venue’s upcoming events (calendar)
api_list.description: Find upcoming events for a venue. Use our venue search to find a venue ID.

api_list.name: User’s upcoming events (calendar)
api_list.description: Find upcoming events on a user’s calendar. There is another API request for past events.

api_list.name: Location search
api_list.description: Search for locations: a city and its metro area. A metro area is a city or a collection of cities that Songkick uses to notify users of concerts near them.

api_list.name: Metro area’s upcoming events (calendar)
api_list.description: Find upcoming events for a metro area. A metro area is a city or a collection of cities that Songkick uses to notify users of concerts near them. Use our location search to find a metro area ID.

api_list.name: Upcoming event search
